resources.string:
Idea, code: Vitamin/CAIG
 Design: Restorer, Vitamin/CAIG, Nodeus

 Used sources:
 	AYEmul by S.Bulba
 	AYFly by Ander
 	Pusher by Himik/ZxZ
 Used libraries:
 	boost
 	zlib by Jean-Loup Gailly and Mark Adler
 	z80ex by Boo-boo
 	lhasa by Simon Howard
 	DragSortListView by Carl A.Bauer
 	unrar by Alexander Roshal
 	libxmp by Claudio Matsuoka
 	libsidplayfp+resid
 	snes_spc by Shay Green
 	Game_Music_Emu by Shay Green and Chris Moeller
 	7-Zip by Igor Pavlov
 	HVL2WAV by Peter Gordon
 	Crashlytics by Twitter
 	Highly Experimental by Neill Corlett
 	lazyusf2 by Christopher Snowhill
 	mGBA by Jeffrey Pfau
 	vio2sf by Christopher Snowhill
 	Highly Threoretical by Neill Corlett and Christopher Snowhill
 	ASAP by Piotr Fusik
 
 Dedicated to Lizzi
